metaElementDuplicated.description: Report message when the 'theme-color' meta element is duplicated
metaElementDuplicated.message: A 'theme-color' meta element is not needed as one was already specified.

metaElementInvalidContent.description: Report message when the 'theme-color' meta element has an invalid value for 'content'
metaElementInvalidContent.message: The 'theme-color' meta element 'content' attribute should have a valid color value.

metaElementInBody.description: Report message when the 'theme-color' meta element is specified in the '<body>'
metaElementInBody.message: The 'theme-color' meta element should be specified in the '<head>', not '<body>'.

metaElementInvalidName.description: Report message when the 'theme-color' meta element has an invalid 'name'
metaElementInvalidName.message: The 'theme-color' meta element 'name' attribute value should be 'theme-color'.

metaElementNotSpecified.description: Report message when the 'theme-color' meta element was not specified
metaElementNotSpecified.message: A 'theme-color' meta element was not specified.

metaElementUnsupported.description: Report message when the 'theme-color' meta element has an unsupported value for 'content'
metaElementUnsupported.message: The 'theme-color' meta element 'content' attribute uses a color value not supported by all target browsers.
